channel.title: Thinking Fallacies on Yak Shaving
channel.description: Recent content in Thinking Fallacies on Yak Shaving

item.title: Ambiguity Effect
item.description: Ambiguity effect is the tendency to avoid options for which missing information makes the probability of the outcome seem “unknown.

item.title: Disposition Effect
item.description: Finance researches have documented a colossal preference for selling winners rather than losers bias that has been know as the disposition effect.
